name: Empty Space Simulator 2014
description:
This was a joke back in the day, aimed at the suddenly popping up BS simulators. (https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/empty-space-simulator-2014)

Joke is on me, they all made a lot (or some) money – this was deleted even from Greenlight Concept. And now i realized that i can build a memorial to my failure.

Or maybe raise millions of dollars from ironic contributions and make ESS 2014 Remaster, who knows?
